title: Computer-Assisted Scientific Vocabulary Acquisition Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized scientific vocabulary learning for office/administrative professionals, emphasizing workplace relevance

learning_goals: Learners can acquire over 300 specialized science vocabulary terms with 80% accuracy within 12 weeks using CAVA software.
Learners achieve a 90% or higher matching rate in vocabulary meaning-linking activities (word-definition-image).
Learners score 85 or higher on weekly vocabulary quizzes for three consecutive attempts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
